summary: This add spells that makes you transform into deadly type of creatures
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/1_zps420326e1.png[/img][/center]
[line]

[center][youtube]mlu1uAb4-5M[/youtube][/center]

[line]
[center][img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/123_zps184fcf8a.png[/img][/center]

requires [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] to work. (1.06.12 or higher)
requires Skyrim version 1.9.32

[line]
[center][img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/descrip_zps36defca9.png[/img][/center]

Adds a lore Friendly spells that transforms you into Deadly Creatures.
While you have the spell. it gives you + attributes and negative attributes.

[line]
[center][img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/detail_zps41e77c8e.png[/img][/center]

All spells available:
[list]
[*]Atronach Flame
[*]Atronach Droid
[*]Dwarven Keeper
[*]Dwarven Gargoyle
[*]Vile Sabre Cat
[*]Golem Stone
[/list]

Spells in WIP
[list]
[*]Ashe spawn
[*]Gargoyle
[*]Werebear
[*]Atronach Frost
[*]Atronach Storm
[*]Riekling
[*]Giant Golem Stone
[*]Keeper
[/list]
